title: Isekai Chef to Saikyou Boushokuhi
original_name: 異世界シェフと最強暴食姫
sinopse:
Summoned to a world where the concept of cooking doesn't exist, the young chef Leo must now prepare some delicious dishes for one devilish customer! Join him and the curious glutton Renatos on their quest for new and exciting meals in this all-you-can-eat isekai tale!

(Source: Black Cat Scanlations)
